name: I Am Gloria
author: Webtronic Labs

sections.description:
Gloria AI (TM) is a human-like conversational AI virtual assistant that acts as your customer and sales representative. Created by Webtronic Labs.

Features

  • Q&A: Link questions to precise answers, control content for your visitors, and drive customer engagement with actions like calls, emails, or website visits.

  • Knowledge Base: Manage your assistant’s knowledge base, enhancing accuracy by uploading multiple documents, links, or plain text for better customer responses.

  • Sessions: Review chat interactions history and add successful interactions to Q&A. Sessions are organized by status between active, closed, archived, or favorites.

  • Chat Customization: Personalize your assistant’s appearance and behavior, from contact information to default replies.

  • Multilanguage Support: Gloria communicates in multiple languages, switching from one to another instantaneously.

  • Integrations: Gloria can be integrated with many popular platforms like WordPress, Wix, Shopify, JumpSeller, BigCommerce, and more.

  • Constant Development: Gloria AI is continually evolving, undergoing constant development to bring you the latest and most innovative features.

  • Full Support: Our clients receive dedicated guidance and support to ensure an optimal experience throughout their journey.

Links

  • Link to Website
  • Documentation
sections.installation:
Important
Before installing the Gloria AI plugin, ensure that you have successfully created an account at iamgloria.com and completed the registration process for the specific website where you intend to deploy the plugin.

  • Log in to your WordPress admin panel.
  • Go to Plugins.
  • Click “Add New.
  • In the search bar, type “Gloria” or “Gloria Assistant”
  • Locate the plugin named “I Am Gloria” with the corresponding Gloria logo
  • Click “Install Now”
  • Once installed, click the “Activate” button
sections.faq:
How do I activate the plugin on my WordPress website?

Login to your Gloria admin account, go to settings, and then installation, copy your account id, and paste it into the plugin settings.

There is a free version of the Gloria service?

Yes, you can create an account at iamgloria.com and use our free 14-day trial period.

Where can I find Gloria’s settings in my WordPress admin panel?

You can find the Gloria plugin configuration in the settings option in your WordPress admin panel.

My customers are receiving an answer message that says “Something went wrong”

This message means that there is a problem with Gloria’s internal services, such as a server error or an AI API response problem.

Why the chat bubble message of my AI assistant is empty?

Check that you have created at least one conversation starter message, that your profile info is complete and you have a business description.

The answer from my AI Assistant is not what I expected on the Q&A entry

The user did not ask a question that may match your Q&A entry, Please make some variations of the questions that may match that question, Add the answer from the session, and edit the answer.

My AI assistant is answering my clients “This tenant is not active. Please contact website owner to activate it!”

You must verify that your account has no pending payments, check if your payment method has enough funds or if your card has not expired

There is some text in the send button and close chat view

Check your internet connection, the website and Gloria are not fully loaded.

My AI Assistant is not answering the questions of my users

There is a problem with the connection to the database and AI answer-generating process, please try again or contact support.

I can’t access my account

Please check your email and password, if you have forgotten your password, use the button to reset your password using the email sent to you.

My file can’t be upload to File Uploader

Check that your document, text, or website has enough information, more than 10 characters on text, 200 characters minimum on documents.
sections.changelog:
1.1.5

  • March 27, 2024
  • Minor fixes

1.1.3

  • February 21, 2024
  • Documentation update

1.1.2

  • February 19, 2024
  • Allow microphone for voice notes

1.1.1

  • December 27, 2023
  • Gloria Script relative to WordPress plugin folder

1.1.0

  • November 27, 2023
  • Fav position customization update
  • Security improvements

1.0.5

  • November 15, 2023
  • Security improvements

1.0

  • September 13, 2023
  • Indigestion is now decentralized, heavily increasing speed and performance.
  • Gloria automatically scans the whole company website after finishing the Quick Setup, so no configuration is needed to start suing Gloria.
  • Gloria answers questions in Spanish, Italian, French and Mandarin, more multi-language features coming soon.
  • Settings – Profile: Easily update your company’s contact information, Gloria will learn the data and use it for the answers of your customers who request contact information such as phone or email
  • Several UI/UX improvements for better use and flexibility

0.9.5

  • August 16, 2023
  • File Uploader: Train Gloria by uploading your documents and files. Let her learn from your data.
  • Q&A – Custom Responses: Define personalized responses for specific questions. Gloria’s answers will reflect your unique touch.
  • Q&A – Action: Now you can create action buttons for answers, so your customers can call you, send an email, or visit a specific URL
  • Sessions: Track conversation history and improve Gloria’s answers, so she will have the best answer the next time a customer asks that question.
